welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Waxahachie, a charming city known for its historic architecture, lively downtown area, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that Waxahachie has to offer during your stay with us. Enjoy your visit!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redbird Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redbird Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arlington Municipal Airport houses the check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Arlington Municipal Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Corsicana Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Corsicana Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Love Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Southwest Airlines Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is solely dedicated to Southwest Airlines, the largest carrier at Love Field Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
